summary: Defines a suite of automated tests that validate the Tapas model's configuration, its behavior on masked language modeling, question answering, and sequence classification tasks, as well as the consistency between its PyTorch and TensorFlow implementations.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the Tapas model across multiple NLP tasks and frameworks, supporting reliable integration into applications that require tableâ€‘based question answering and related functionalities.
